titles.title: To amend the Bill Emerson Humanitarian Trust Act to provide clarification with respect to the period of time for which funds may be held in the trust established under that Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Specialty Crops and Foreign Agriculture Programs.

committee.subcommittee: Specialty Crops and Foreign Agriculture Programs
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 5/9/2003--Introduced. Amends the Bill Emerson Humanitarian Trust Act to permit funds to be held in the food security commodity trust for such time as the Secretary of Agriculture determines to be appropriate.
